snippet: The retailer, viewed as a bellwether for the industry, is seeing encouraging signs for the holiday shopping season.
abstract: Macy's reports fiscal third-quarter profit of $177 million, or 47 cents a share, up 22 percent from $145 million, or 36 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 3 percent to $6.28 billion.
lead_paragraph: The retailer, viewed as a bellwether for the industry, is seeing encouraging signs for the holiday shopping season.

headline.main: Profit at Macy’s Rose 22%, Topping Analyst Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Profit at Macy’s Rose 22%, Topping Analyst Forecasts
